description:
(This mod is on BETA so many things can change in the future)

This is my first mod, so dont hope its going to have very high quality. This mod adds new units, turrets, factories, ores, a new planet and more (Extra: the textures are made in paint by the way,Develoment Help: melis and WALLE-E)
subtitle: Play Silivirium too
